Package Kount_Log\Factory

Interface summary

Kount_Log_Factory_LoggerFactory Interface for factory classes that create Kount_Log_Binding_Logger objects.

Class summary

Kount_Log_Factory_LogFactory A factory class for creating Kount_Log_Factory_LoggerFactory objects.
Kount_Log_Factory_SimpleLoggerFactory A factory class that creates Kount_Log_Binding_SimpleLogger objects.
Kount_Log_Factory_NopLoggerFactory A factory class that creates Kount_Log_Binding_NopLogger objects.
